Test Name: COVID-19, Influenza A/B, and RSV Real-Time RT-PCR
Specimen Type: Nasopharyngeal, oropharyngeal, or nasal swabs, and nasopharyngeal aspirates
Purpose: To accurately detect and report SARS-CoV-2, Influenza A/B, and RSV in patient respiratory specimens.
Equipment: Real-time PCR instrument (e.g., ABI 7500, Roche LightCycler) with RNA extraction kit
